body:
Hey guys this team is mainly for inexperienced players (with tournaments), not meaning bad at pvp just not competed before. All you need to do is copy and paste this:

Skype (get discord):
Timezone:
Prefered Position:
Second Prefered Position:
Can You Defend If Nobody Else Can?
Kills:
Deaths:
K/D:
Time Spent On Avicus (Check profile):

and fill in the details, have fun!
